name: Oopland
description:
Welcome to Oopland, filled with characters such as Boops, Zoops, and Moops! Control your own Boop, and try not to get eaten by the green Zoops. To win, eat all the blue Moops. Enjoy!

NOTE: MORE LEVELS COMING SOON!

***If you cannot see the 'Click to Play' button on the How to Play screen, press P to begin playing. In case you cannot see the instructions: LEFT and RIGHT to move, SPACE to jump, avoid the green Zoops, eat all blue Moops to win.
